value.name: Man shot by homeowner in self-defense faces multiple charges
value.description: SALT LAKE CITY — A man who police say was shot by a Hurricane homeowner in self-defense after he threatened to kill the homeowner and another man is due back in court on Thursday. Raul Rivera ...

value.name: Party host calls Bridgeport murders a ‘nightmare’ as gunfire at Little League game prompts Lamont visit
value.description: Yellow police tape marks off the crime scene as ... His landlord could not be reached Monday for comment. Raul Rivera owns Evolution Tattoo, a business next door to where the party was held.

value.name: Homeowner shoots suspected shingle thief
value.description: HOUSTON It was a dramatic robbery that ended with a suspect, 23-year-old Arthur Amaya, being shot in the hip by homeowner Raul Rivera ... which police say was loaded with shingles.
